docs.lead_paragraph: Before sailing for South America yesterday on the Royal Mail steam Packet liner Orinoco Capt. Horace Hood, the British Naval Attache at Washington, said there was nothing significant in his visit to the Republics of Peru, Chile, Argentina, and Brazil to inspect the navies of those countries.

headline.main: TO INSPECT THEIR NAVIES.; British Naval Attache Starts for South America.

docs.abstract: Brit naval attache in Washington, Capt H Hood, sails for S Amer to inspect foreign navies
docs.snippet: Before sailing for South America yesterday on the Royal Mail steam Packet liner Orinoco Capt. Horace Hood, the British Naval Attache at Washington, said there was nothing significant in his visit to the Republics of Peru, Chile, Argentina, and Brazil...
